inland.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an inland area, city etc is not near the coast
inland.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the largest area of inland water in the southeast
inland.translation[1].definitions[0].def: in a direction away from the coast and towards the centre of a country
inland.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The mountains are five miles inland.
inland.translation[2].definitions[0].def: inland mail or TRANSPORT services are those used for letters or goods being sent within a country, not abroad
inland.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: The letter was lost in the inland post.
inland.translation[2].definitions[1].def: an inland area, city, point etc is away from the coast
inland.translation[2].definitions[1].exa: Loading starts not at the port, but at inland depots.
ships that operate on inland waterways
